entry.title: Wooden Dragons
entry.summary:
Author: CaffeinatedFlumadiddle

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,930Chapters: 4/10Kudos: 475

Summary: “You-” Ygraine said, stepping up to point a finger in Uther’s face. “You are a liar and a murderer. The fact someone as sweet and caring as Vivienne is destined to marry you is a tragedy in itself, but if you expect me to hand over my brother’s rightful claim to Camelot’s throne-”“My claim to Camelot’s throne,” Uther threw back, face growing more red as Arthur looked between his parents in utter bewilderment. Merlin didn’t blame him. He had envisioned Uther and Ygraine’s love story to be more… well, less based in war and battles.Ygraine’s eyes narrowed as she grabbed a goblet of wine and threw it in Uther’s face. A few of the guards shifted, but Uther only raised a hand to pause them, spitting out the wine with furious eyes.“You,” Ygraine said coldly. “Are unworthy to sit upon a stool, let alone a throne.”From a few feet away, Balinor scoffed as he sipped from his own goblet. “I kind of like having her as a hostage, Uther. She livens up the place.”OrIn a desperate attempt to save Arthur at Camlann, Merlin tries to reverse time. It works perhaps a tad too well.

entry.title: I Will Burn The World, If It Would Keep You Warm.
entry.summary:
Author: Winters_Pheonix

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,862Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 42

Summary: By the year Prince Arthur Pendragon turned twenty-one and he came of age, he was already a man who had barely enjoyed a childhood. A man who had closed off his heart so fiercely that at times it seemed he did not even possess one. That was until, a young boy two years younger, with a cheeky smile, eyes like a clear river and raven hair walked into Camelot and insulted the prince at their very first meeting.His name...Merlin..................................................................................................................................................................................................An entire canon rewrite, with a darker and mature Arthur and an equally smarter Merlin.As the story goes on Tags may change related to blood and violence. If that happens, warnings will at the beginning of the chapter.!!!!READ THE TAGS!!!!

entry.title: Dearest Friend
entry.summary:
Author: TotoUnderground

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,856Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 271

Summary: The druids are not convinced of Arthur’s acceptance of magic. Since he is already married to Queen Guinevere, he can’t reassure them with a political marriage. But what about a consort with magical abilities? Merlin is happy for Arthur and Gwen, even though his heart hurts everytime he sees them and he tries to pull away from them, he is not their friend after all, he is just a servant. Watching them from afar is hard already, but how can he stand to watch Arthur doting on a royal favourite, a consort.

entry.title: Checking Out Love
entry.summary:
Author: saintelsewhere

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,940Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 17

Summary: The Ealdor Public Library, where Merlin works as a librarian, is struggling amidst budget cuts and declining patron visits. As a last ditch effort, Library Manager Gaius calls in a favour from his friend Uther Pendragon, CEO of Camelot's top consulting firm, The Pendragon Group.Uther sends his son Arthur to lead the project in Ealdor and work closely with Merlin. The two have a rocky start, but as they spend time together they come to understand one another better.Or, Arthur falls in love with sexy librarian Merlin.

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 105,819Chapters: 15/19Kudos: 336

entry.title: love me like you used to (and i’ll praise you like i should)
entry.summary:
Author: moonlit_author

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,256Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 48

Summary: Five years ago, Merlin was exiled from Camelot under Crown Prince Arthur’s orders. His friend, his destiny. And secretly, Merlin could admit that Arthur would probably be the only man he’d ever love.One year ago, Arthur became King after his father passed due to an unknown illness. He governs his people alone and bears it as best as he can. After all, it is what he deserves after that day, five years ago.But attacks have become rampant ever since he took the throne. A mysterious group of sorcerers marked with a similar showing a full moon have started to appear and become notorious. Merlin and Arthur will come to meet again to, once again, save Camelot.—In other words. I’m dramatic. They pine and fight together with their friends by their side. Aren’t you glad it isn’t that complicated?

entry.title: Folk Magic and Belief - A Crash Course
entry.summary:
Author: LeMightyWorrier

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,912Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 91

Summary: Folk magic: Usually simple charms, spells or rituals passed down from person to person or within a community, commonly used for healing, luck, fertility, divination and protection from harm.Folk belief: A broad genre of folklore that is often expressed in narratives, customs, rituals, foodways, proverbs, and rhymes.Merlin's use of charms and cures leads Arthur to believe that Merlin is a sorcerer. Little does Arthur know, Merlin is, in fact, a sorcerer. Either way, he's going to keep the idiot from the pyre.

entry.summary:
Author: Vivirki

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,986Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 125

Summary: After Camleot is overrun by Morgause's army and Morgana is revealed to be a spy, Merlin is forced to free The Great Dragon. He gives him the answer he seeks yet takes something much larger, as the citadel is weak he takes the opportunity and kills Uther Pendragon.Arthur, overcome with loss begins searching for the only man who can help him defeat The Great Dragon, the last Dragonlord. What they find, however, is much more than either Merlin or Arthur expected. In the shadow of that cruel night, Merlin must face the truth of his heritage and hide it from his best friend, the new king of Camelot.

entry.title: The Fragility of Innocence
entry.summary:
Author: httphowell

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,806Chapters: 11/27Kudos: 76

Summary: Merlin, the crown prince of Camelot, is renowned for his beauty and grace but lives a sheltered life under the watchful eye of his father, King Balinor, who views him as fragile. Unaware of the world beyond the castle walls, Merlin’s life changes when the brave knight Arthur enters the picture, showing him the depth of love and teaching him to find his own voice.Together, they must face the trials that come their way.

entry.title: run, like the hounds of hell are at your heels
entry.summary:
Author: insane_falcon

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 709Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 32

Summary: Merlin winces as the wood creaks under his pry bar. He strains his ears, but only the sounds of nature echo back to him. Slowly he lifts himself up through the window. His foot slips on the way down and he falls to the ground with a dull thump. Pain radiates from his ankle. Merlin grits his teeth, pulling a bandage from his backpack and wrapping it around his ankle. The pain settles to a dull throb and that’s when Merlin hears it. A clicking noise. aka a The Last of Us au
